results.title: Metformin and Ara-a Effectively Suppress Brain Cancer by Targeting Cancer Stem/Progenitor Cells
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, an adenosine monophosphate-activated protein kinase (@GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@) activator, was effective in suppressing and killing @DISEASE_Glioma @DISEASE_MESH:D005910 @@@glioma@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Neuroblastoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009447 @@@neuroblastoma@@@ cells (Isakovic et al.,; Shackelford and Shaw,; Kumar et al.,; Liu et al.,).
